subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: James Hinchcliffe will be back in an Indy car for the first time since a nearly fatal accident in May when he tests next week at Road America in Elkhart Lake, Wis.
snippet: James Hinchcliffe will be back in an Indy car for the first time since a nearly fatal accident in May when he tests next week at Road America in Elkhart Lake, Wis.
